title: A farther defence of dramatick poetry being the second part of the review of Mr. Collier's View of the immorality and profaneness of the stage / done by the same hand.
author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
notes: Part 1 of this is entitled: A defence of dramatick poetry.
Written by E. Settle. Cf. Wing; NCBEL. Also attributed to E. Filmer by NUC pre-1956 imprints and T. Rymer by BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
